item.description:
RSVP Early! This one is always extremely popular!!

Get together for Girls Night Out at the Melting Pot, (next to Jordan's Furniture 92 Worcester Rd., Framingham) We'll be ordering the three course Girls Night Special which includes a glass of wine or specialty drink (Chocolate Martini anyone?) as well as cheese fondue, salad and a decadent chocolate fondue dessert featuring strawberries, bananas, cheesecake,shortcake, marshmallows and other amazing dipping items. This is a great deal and with tax/tip ends up being around $32 per person (any additional drinks extra.)

Be sure to rsvp early for this one!
item.name: Mom's Night Out @ The Melting Pot
